programme.long_synopsis:
Roy Plomley's castaway is former Brain Of Britain and radio personality Irene Thomas.

Favourite track: Soave Sia Il Vento by Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart
Book: Score of the opera Fidelio by Beethoven
Luxury: Teddy bear stuffed with tea bags

programme.title: Desert Island Discs
